Description: 2013 SCHECTER NV-III-24-AS RD/M Electric Guitar Made in Japan w/ free Roadrunner HSC. The Original Super Rock and Monstertone pickups are included also. I had a Gotoh Battery Compartment installed, so this is set up for active pickups if you so prefer. Installed are:Bridge = Seymour Duncan Custom CustomMiddle = Seymour Duncan Hot for StratNeck = Seymour Duncan 59 Humbucker These guitars are extremely hard to get in the United States. And do not come up for sale in the states often. This is your chance to get your hands on one for your very own at a .99cent auction w/ NO RESERVE.This guitar is absolutely beautiful, comes with all of its original paperwork and hardware ( owners manual, allen keys and Trem bar, receipts for maintenance)If you have never used a Schecter Official Floating Bridge than you are in for a treat. I think they are far superior to Floyd Rose. Comes shipped in a Road Runner Hardshell Case included free. Please feel free to ask any questions.
